Construction_Task_Breakdown.Description: Clearing the site, setting out building corners, and preparing for ground works.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Required_Labor: 25 person-days, including general laborers and a site engineer.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Quality_Control_Requirements: Ensure the site is cleared according to local regulations and layout preciseness.

Construction_Task_Breakdown.Description: Excavation for foundation, setting formworks, arranging rebar, pouring concrete, and curing.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Required_Labor: 50 person-days, including concrete workers and structural engineers.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Quality_Control_Requirements: Concrete mix and rebar placement must meet structural engineering standards.

Construction_Task_Breakdown.Description: Erecting external and internal walls using bricks for the external and cement blocks for internal partitions.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Quality_Control_Requirements: Wall alignments, level, and plumb lines to be frequently checked.

Construction_Task_Breakdown.Description: Installing timber roof trusses and framing sections.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Quality_Control_Requirements: All wooden elements to be treated for weather resistance and checked for load-bearing capacity.

Construction_Task_Breakdown.Description: Installation of pipes, fittings, and sanitary fixtures for water distribution and waste removal.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Quality_Control_Requirements: Pressure tests for leaks and compliance with health and safety standards.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Room_Location_Specific_Details: Specific to bathrooms, kitchen, and any utility areas.

Construction_Task_Breakdown.Description: Wiring of electrical circuits, installation of circuit breakers, outlets, and light fixtures.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Quality_Control_Requirements: All installations to meet electrical safety codes.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Room_Location_Specific_Details: Throughout all rooms, focusing on areas that need dedicated power supplies.

Construction_Task_Breakdown.Description: Installation of flooring, wall coverings, and ceiling treatments in various rooms as specified in materials quantities.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Required_Labor: 100 person-days, including specialized trades for flooring, painting, and ceiling installation.

Materials_Used.Materials: As per 'Materials Quantities' section based on each specific room.

Construction_Task_Breakdown.Quality_Control_Requirements: Finish levels for painting and tile work, adherence to design specifications.
Construction_Task_Breakdown.Room_Location_Specific_Details: Different specific requirements for living room, kitchen, bedrooms, bathroom, dining room, office, and hallway.
